subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Pekka Rinne made 30 saves for his first career shutout and the Nashville Predators scored twice in the third period for a 2-0 victory over the Sabres in Buffalo.
snippet: Pekka Rinne made 30 saves for his first career shutout and the Nashville Predators scored twice in the third period for a 2-0 victory over the Sabres in Buffalo.
